name: Expert Driver

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Skilled Driver with the selected vehicle type.

sections.body: You can make an accelerate, decelerate, or turn action as a move action instead of a standard action. Furthermore, when stopping a vehicle, you subtract 10 feet from the roll to determine how many feet the vehicle moves forward before it stops.
sections.name: Benefits

description: When driving a chosen type of vehicle, you exhibit incredible control, maneuvering the vehicle with greater ease and stopping with uncanny precision.
